short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facilitates flashing and debugging TI devices from the cloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension facilitates flashing and debugging hardware devices from the Texas Instruments Cloud IDE. The actual flashing and debugging is performed by the TICloudAgent application which must be installed separately. This extension acts as a bridge to that application by launching and then communicating with it via a web sockets interface.
